snippet: Three writing prompts based on recent Times content, devised and tested by a ninth-grade class in New Jersey. This week's collection includes a restaurant review that has gone viral ... one student called it the "best article we've read this year."
abstract: Three writing prompts based on recent Times content, devised and tested by a ninth-grade class in New Jersey. This week's collection includes a restaurant review that has gone viral ... one student called it the "best article we've read this year."

byline.original: By JONATHAN OLSEN, SARAH GROSS and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

headline.main: Common Core Practice | Bad Reviews, Elite Schools and Facebook Fakes
